Windlord/Elita/Nightlight:

"I'll go with him..."Windlord follow Denzabar and speak with 
him"Told me Denzabar... Have you seen people like us out there????"

Nighlight looked Azure, she remeber his actitude when they where 
somewhere in the matrix, and she wonder what was going with him.

Elita meowed annoyed, her little tummy started with hunger pains and 
she liked her bottle "Bobble... dyddy!! bobble"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> OOC: Hope you don't mind me controlling the Ships PC for a sec, 
maybe this 
> shall help things.
> 
> 
> BIC: The Ships computer interupted the conversation. " Subject 
Denzabar has 
> full knowledge of what he is, his memory has been, however, 
damaged from the 
> crash. His speech output has been damaged as well. His original 
programming was 
> set to be a studier, He shares a Spark with a Cybertronian Elder. 
A pacifist 
> his data reads." THe caveman, listening to the ship, grunted 
oddly. " I speak 
> like .....my.....c..c.c.lan. I have...d..d.d.r.dr..dreams of 
> .....villages....v..v..villae...of...shiny.." THe Caveman stopped, 
he just gave up trying to 
> explain and started to walk out. He ave a grunt of goodbye as he 
walked.
